summary: Clothing retexture of Sheogorath\'s suit, made to look like a butler\'s uniform.  Available at Radiant Raiment in Solitude.
descriptionHtml:
A mod that adds a butler uniform retexture based on Sheogarath\'s outfit. The outfit comes in a non-enchanted, and enchanted(+speechcraft) version, both of which are sold by Radiant Raiment in Solitude. 

I created this mod for those who wanted a butler uniform that could be given to a follower, or used by fellow Mod creators. In case anyone did want to suit up and make an impression when back in town, I added a couple of versions to the Radiant Raiment store in Solitude.

I initially created this after hearing about how another mod-maker was looking for a butler outfit. So I decided to whip up a quick retexture and this is what I came up with. If anyone does want to use the resources from this mod in their own mods, please just include a note back to this mod. Thanks and happy modding.






NOTES:
-Unfortunately only available for male characters, as Sheogorath\'s outfit only has a male 3D model.
-Hands and forearms in 1st person view are low quality when equipped.
author: Novamonk

files.name: Butler_Uniform
files.changelogHtml: Added basic butler uniform, and enchanted version to Radiant Raiment store
